rows.label: tev024201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Percilla about the provisional government.

rows.label: tev024201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Percilla if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Percilla about this district.

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Percilla about the buildings of NLA.

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Percilla about businesses.

rows.label: tev024201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Percilla about recent developments.

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0001
rows.name:
The provisional government is our system of self-
governance, headed by Director General Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Don't tell me you thought that BLADE was running this
whole city by itself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0003
rows.name:
BLADE handles the fighting, but the provisional
government manages the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0004
rows.name: It's a very clear division of duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Mediators protect the city and also serve police-like
functions within it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0009
rows.name:
But there are some problems they can't resolve without
further help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0010
rows.name:
That said, I simply do not have the manpower to
resolve some of the more minor grievances that are
brought to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0011
rows.name:
It would be nice if there were good Samaritans
available who were willing to make the effort to solve
those sorts of problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0020
rows.name:
A lot of people cross through this area to go to the
commercial and residential districts instead of following
the proper route. It's becoming a problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Even after we had an elevator installed, there's no end
of people who would rather leap down from the terrace
in front of BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Sometimes people botch the landing and hurt
themselves, or end up taking a header into the
shock-absorbing gel below.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0023
rows.name:
They shouldn't be taking the protective properties of
mimeosomes and ground gear for granted like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0024
rows.name:
But I'm sure YOU always take the elevator or transport
like a proper [ST:gender p1=gentleman p2=lady ], right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Most of the buildings in this district are being used for
purposes other than the ones for which they were
originally intended.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0031
rows.name:
For example, BLADE Tower was originally supposed to
house government offices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0032
rows.name:
But Secretary Nagi and Commander Vandham
convinced the grumbling bureaucrats to let BLADE use
it instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0033
rows.name:
That's how the provisional government ended up being
moved to this smaller building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0039
rows.name:
In the original plan for New LA, a street of office
buildings was going to be built between the
commercial and administrative districts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Have you noticed the steady growth that the arms
manufacturers have been experiencing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG0041
rows.name:
When this crisis ends, we'll probably have to revise our
construction plans a second time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG1001
rows.name:
What happened with the situation at Alesa's store?
...Oh, she decided to serve Ma-non customers?
That's good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG1002
rows.name:
I'm pleased that Alesa has come to understand what it
means to do business on a new world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Hopefully the Ma-non will learn more about Earth's
clothing industry and incorporate that knowledge
into Ma-non businesses like Candid & Credible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024201_MSG1004
rows.name:
I know that company makes high-quality ground gear,
yet I can't say I'm enthusiastic about their designs...[ST:wait ]
